hero.heading: HI, I'M LUCAS WELTER!
hero.intro: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from UFMS, driven by technology and focused on developing innovative and impactful solutions.

aboutSection.heading: About Me
aboutSection.description: Enthusiast of new technologies and complex challenges, with experience in developing robust and scalable applications, driven by curiosity and a focus on efficient solutions.

education.title: Education
content: Federal University of Mato Grosso do Sul - Bachelor's in Software Engineering (2020–2023)

frontEnd.title: Front-end

backEnd.title: Back-end
backEnd.description: Building robust server-side solutions with a focus on scalability, performance, and security.

fullStack.title: Full Stack
fullStack.description: Combining front-end and back-end expertise to deliver cohesive, end-to-end solutions.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Engineered requirements for product discovery, worked as a developer and acted as Scrum Master.
Developed and deployed the back and front end of an AI camera monitoring system, made for the basic health units of Campo Grande - MS.
Used technologies such as TypeScript, Node.js, Vue.js, Fastify, Prisma, and Docker.

experiences.title: Mobile Developer
description: Responsible for developing mobile apps using Flutter.
Helped new trainees get acquainted with configuration management and agile methodology.

experiences.title: Bidding Department Member
description: Participated in the creation and execution of bidding processes.
Introduced the Trello platform to improve process management.
Generated economic charts for each bidding type.

emailSection.heading: Let's Connect!
emailSection.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities, and my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
